member.name: D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_HEAP_DESC.Type
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the types of descriptors in the heap.

member.name: D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_HEAP_DESC.NumDescriptors
member.summary: The number of descriptors in the heap.

member.name: D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_HEAP_DESC.Flags
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies options for the heap.

member.name: D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_HEAP_DESC.NodeMask
member.summary: For single-adapter operation, set this to zero. If there are multiple adapter nodes, set a bit to identify the node (one of the device's physical adapters) to which the descriptor heap applies. Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Only one bit must be set. See Multi-adapter systems.
